The United Kingdom
Coedbach Grounds, Pontardulais, Glamorgan, Wales Promoted by Pontardulais band. Prizes - 1st £12, 2nd £8, 3rd £4. March contest - 1 st Gwaun-cae-Gurwen, 2nd Blaengwynfi. 5 bands competed.
